website_summaries.verdict: Not only are these earbuds easy to use with decent sound quality, they're extremely reasonably priced.
pros: The multi-functional touch control makes it easy to play, pause, and skip tracks
Wireless charging case is useful to have
cons: Occasional problems with pairing left and right earbuds

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: There is a bit of a learning curve Because there’s no cable and this requires allowing the Bluetooth earbuds to pair with themselves afterwhich you must connect the phone to the RIGHT earbud to get sound to come out of both otherwise they will be independent of each other. Sound quality is great for the price, great for phones for the price. I have small ear canals, which become a problem with many other inear headphones, but these worked wonderfully. Overall, worth it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Nice Ear Buds
customer_reviews.text: We go through ear buds like crazy in my home, with two kids under 3 things just happen. So I don't want to spend a fortune on ear buds. These are really great quality buds for the price. I found the noise cancellation a bit lacking but not enough to bother me. I like the size of them in my ears and am happy to find some I like in white. All I've found have been black. They charge really quickly and I've used them for a couple hours straight with no interruptions in quality or sound.
customer_reviews.author: Lis

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal at any price
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, these things are amazing. They sound as good as my $150 Jaybird Runs, and are a third of the size and a sixth of the price. They are so small and comfortable and don't stick out of your ears at all. The touch controls work, and the case (while a little cheap feeling) is small enough to not be a pain to cart around in your pocket. They pair up almost immediately, and you can use either earpiece alone. I bought a pair for my wife and have sold several friends on them. Never had an issue with the battery. The microphone, however, is not good.
customer_reviews.author: Amighty

customer_reviews.title: Great small earbuds with amazing music
customer_reviews.text: These small earbuds are Awesome.. i shocked when i first turned on the music on these earbuds. The music is real loud and with great bass on these. The size of earbuds and charger is small and handy. They turn on automatically once removed from charger. Calls are also crystal clear as i can hear person even even in public commute and person on opposite side can hear me clearly as well. Summing up - I am completely in love with every feature on these earbuds whether it's size, music or call feature and will definitely recommend these to someone who is looking for small and loud earbuds in budget.
customer_reviews.author: Yash P.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for day to day use!
customer_reviews.text: The size of the earphones are surprisingly compact considering the touch functionality with both the ear pieces. Pairing was super easy and automatically switch off when you put it back to the case. The case is very compact and light weighted I don’t even feel when it’s in my pocket. Most importantly it supports SIRI for voice commands. I listen to music almost all day and the ear pieces do not bother me at all even when I’m working out. This is definitely a great buy and looks really high end for the price
customer_reviews.author: Chance

customer_reviews.title: Charging case did not work
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty excited for these when I first ordered them and then I saw they were going to take almost 2 weeks to arrive even with them being a prime option, but either way there was nothing I could do about that. Once I received them I read the directions and charged them immediately. I wore them this weekend golfing and they died right away and were cutting in and out. The charging case does not work and now I am in the process of hopefully getting them returned.
customer_reviews.author: Tanner Murray

customer_reviews.title: Love these buds!  Great value for money!
customer_reviews.text: These Haylou GT1 buds are a great value! I have a $160 pair of Jabra Elite 65t true wireless buds. While the audio and voice quality are both excellent, I was disappointed with the poor wireless range and the inability to use them independently. The Haylou GT1 buds have excellent battery life and wireless range. And they work independently. The audio quality and fit are actually better then the Jabra. The voice mic quality is not quite as good. Also, the Jabra has volume control. These do not. Overall, these are a MUCH better value! Wish I had bought these first and saved my $160.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Be careful! Charging case stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is good, especially for the price. Comfort and fit are also good, again especially for the price. I'd be leaving a 4-5 star review EXCEPT.. The charging/battery case NO LONGER ACCEPTS A CHARGE one month after I purchased. I tried multiple cables and USB adapters with no luck. Since there is no way to charge the earbuds on their own, they are now effective WORTHLESS. It happened one day after the return window ended so my money is wasted.
customer_reviews.author: J Melb

customer_reviews.title: Maybe I had a bad luck
customer_reviews.text: I had to return the product because could not get both parts working for a stereo sound. Talked to Amazon technical support and we tried everything to make them work, but was impossible. its like they could not connect to each other because separated they were working. I can not write a complete review because I could not really teste the earphones, like sound quality, battery life, noise cancelation and so.
customer_reviews.author: VALUSA

customer_reviews.title: Quick easy pairing and connecting with good sound!
customer_reviews.text: These have the one distinct advantage of pairing pretty easily and reliably with my Android phone. I have used others and they don't do as well or are fidgety. The button is a touch button which means that the unit has no physical buttons for water and sweat to get through to the in we electronic parts which is a bonus. The left or right bud can be used independently as well.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these earpods! So small and cute, but made well. The sound is amazing, I tested some classical as well as some folk/Americana and oldies and they sound great with all of them! The charging pod and case is pocket-sized, sleek, and looks and works great. 10/10 product!
customer_reviews.author: Annika Downey

customer_reviews.title: Love these so much I got 2! Had trouble charging but they worked!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered my first set and couldn’t figure out how to charge them. You have to make sure you take off the sticker where they connect to the charger. Once I figured that out, the rest was easy! I found it super easy to connect both the left and right headphones at the same time so I’m not sure why others are having issues. I like them so much I got another pair for my boyfriend! He loves them too!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Superb! Read the product manual carefully!
customer_reviews.text: I love these ear buds! The sound it outstanding and they are very subtle when worn. They're now my favorite ear buds to use when cleaning, exercising, cooking, etc!
customer_reviews.author: tree

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality for not a lot of money
customer_reviews.text: I was a little confused about the auto-pair function until I realized they automatically pair with each other. You still have to manually pair them to your device. These were great. The sound quality was good, once I figured out how to make them work. I really liked the single output mode. If you're only using one, all of the sounds goes trough that one instead of being split like wired earbuds. Unfortunately, they didn't last long. They fell out of my bag when I was leaving work the other day and got run over. RIP earbuds. Ordering another set.
customer_reviews.author: kestrel

customer_reviews.title: Love them but 3-stars at best
customer_reviews.text: I love these little headphones! Sound quality is excellent, battery life is great, especially with the rechargeable case, but I do have problems with them. First, the touch panel is not as sensitive as I would like, which makes answering calls and hanging up a hassle from the ear piece. Sometimes even attempting to turn them off requires multiple attempts to hit the "right spot" for it shut down. Second, losing connection with the phone or not synching with each other and having to resync them every so often. Also the instructions for resyncing was not clear in the manual had to find a video to be able to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Takeo_San

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound quality
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds were an excellent purchase. Easy to connect. The sound they provide is fantastic. I would put these up against the most expensive. They were easy to connect to my phone for music as well as phone calls. Make sure you read the instructions provided to ensure you probably charge them and remove the plastic covering where they fit in the charging base. Awesome purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dee Jones

customer_reviews.title: Look Gucci Without Paying Gucci
customer_reviews.text: Look no further these are the wireless earbuds you want. I can confirm this I've done my own research and these are better than my brother's Apple AirPods w/ wireless charging. Well almost, in terms of apple ecosystem and final finish the AirPods still reign dominant. (they should for that price premium) What makes these GT1s so slick is that they do something apple's been sleeping on for such a long time. They come in matte black. *mic drop* In all seriousness, they work really well and I have no issues with them. Would love to see an updated design with wireless charging, USB-C, and a more robust hinge mechanism on the charging case.
customer_reviews.author: Reynol

customer_reviews.title: Good daily drivers
customer_reviews.text: Sound is more than good enough for speech and some light music. The case is a good shape; small and portable but not too small. Pairing with each other and with phones worked well. Controls are responsive; just needs to add a swipe action for volume control.
customer_reviews.author: HQB

customer_reviews.title: Value and quality
customer_reviews.text: Liked: - clear sounds from both L & R earpiece - battery life can last for a week (depending on usage). - when put one earpiece, it really cancels the sound from the side w/ the earpiece. When both earpieces are put in, it really cancels out the noise (depending on how high you put the volume on your phone). - case is small for pocket size, ear buds come w/ diff. size ear pieces. - once earbud is put into the case and is closed, the case automatically starts charging the earbuds. Cons: - have not found any so far - haven't tried using it while exercising (ex. Running, jogging, dancing) Experience after 2 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Debo P

customer_reviews.title: These are great.
customer_reviews.text: You can hardly tell I am wearing earphones. Plus the sound quality is amazing. These really make my music sound so amazing. They beat out any expensive name brand not only in quality, but I would be confident in saying these have a better frequency response then BEATS by Dre. So in my opinion these are better earphones than BEATS by dre. They sound and are made better. + I paid 4x the price for the beats. If you do not want to waste your money. I would highly recommend saving money and using these you will not regret it. These are far superior in sound quality than the more expensive beats earphones.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase...
customer_reviews.text: Insomniac here who listens to audio books on my tablet all night long whenever I wake up. I am using one earbud at a time and so far they last 5-6 hours each during the evening. I use a sleep timer on my audio book apps so the ear buds will turn off after a half hour each time I wake up and listen. They even have a little battery icon which shows up next to the bluetooth icon in the top task bar in Android Oreo that shows how much battery is left. I throw caution to the wind and use them when asleep. :) No problem.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Gamer

customer_reviews.title: Truly cancels out noise, easy to use and fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Husband loved these ! After years of my husband losing his earbuds , the dog chewing a cord , getting them slammed in a door , etc my husband will never use any other kind and I am more than happy as well. My husband hates a long list or manual with a new product and he said right away they were simple to use and understand right away !;With these it really does cancel noise out for him and for me if he is sitting near me I can't hear the music at all!! Couple saver for sure! Ha! Seriously very impressed as I was a little skeptical with the low price and never trying them. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Hana Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Washed and left out in the rain, and it still works.
customer_reviews.text: 7 month review. It sounds good. Very good. The noise cancellation is what you expect from passive noise cancellation. But that’s not the only thing good. 3 months ago, I lost one ear bud but found it 3 weeks later in the bushes of my front yard. Through rain, lots of rain, they charged up and worked. Today, I forgot they were in the pocket of my pants and they went into the wash. I only found out because the case and ear buds were all over the wash. Amazingly, they still worked. I just blew the water out of the case and it still charged.
customer_reviews.author: fightingmink

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORTH THE AGGRAVATION
customer_reviews.text: I bought these october 28, 2019 and since then I’ve only been able to use them a handful of times. They constantly disconnect from each other, if you hardly touch the ear bud at all to adjust it you WILL disconnect them. If you leave them out of the case for a minute to come right back, they will be disconnected. If you look at them wrong, THEY WILL DISCONNECT. I’ve tried following the instructions but they’re written in broken, poorly translated English so they don’t make sense. They would be great if they would stay connected. Not worth your money or patience to try and pair them.
customer_reviews.author: Stevie Kaye Dynoske

customer_reviews.title: Constant pairing issues
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is better than expected from a $20 pair of Airbuds. The weather resistance has so far been perfect. My main problem is the battery life, charging cradle, and pairing. The battery life is approximately 2.5 hours per earbud which is much shorter than expected. Combine that with a case that doesnt consistently make connection with the earbuds and they are constantly dead. So far after the first two days of use I now have to unpair and repair them with my phone everytime I want them to connect. I have done my research to reset the headphones and thus far it has not worked.
customer_reviews.author: Brasconian

customer_reviews.title: Will Stop Working Within Months
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give these earbuds a better review, but I have had two pairs fail on me in less than a year now. The first pair came without the left earbud working. I missed the return date, so that was my fault. But I went ahead and bought a second pair. I've had this pair since October 2019 and they worked fine, until this week when the left earbud once again stopped working. I've tried the factory reset multiple times, nothing has worked. I wish there was a way to contact the company because I'd love to work out an exchange with them so I can give a better review since I did like these earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Kat D.

customer_reviews.title: Surprinsgly good for $20
customer_reviews.text: I previsously had some expensive samsung earbuds and the inside little circles fell out within a few months ending up with terrible sounding earbuds with no bass. I didn't want to spend anothe $150+ so after reading the reviews I took a chanc e on these. These sound surprsingly great and sit perfect in my ears, very pleased with this purchase espeacially for the price. If they last 6 months I'll be happy. I knocked one star off the sound bc at high volumes there is a little bass distortion, but nothing I can't deal with and there's no issue when I turn the volume down a click or 2.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the Price.
customer_reviews.text: Did not expect Earbuds this cheap to be of such amazing quality. They pair super easy and the sound is crisp. I did not record the time each use but I've been consistently getting more than 2 hours from a single charge and I charge the case once a week. I used these while biking and they did not fall off, one of my main fears with earbuds. The mic is also fairly powerful and the receivers on the other end of the calls were able to hear my voice nice and crisp without any disturbance (indoors).
customer_reviews.author: Andy V

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: Noise cancelling is ineffective, if it is actually present. Sound quality is terrible. Fit is poor (even after changing rubber pieces) and they are not comfortable. The charging cable that was included (USB to microUSB) doesn't fit well enough to charge, but thankfully I have others. The instructions are poorly written. The earbuds and cable also contain amounts of lead that exceed EU standards (according to their own "manual"), so wash your hands after using them.
customer_reviews.author: CatMum

customer_reviews.title: Wireless and have a charging case!
customer_reviews.text: These are great noise cancelling wireless earbuds. The case is easy to fit in my purse or pocket. I love that while I am storing them in the case they are charging back up. It did take a bit of a learning curve to get the touch control down but it is easy once you get used to it...double touch to answer a call, hang up a call or switch a song and single touch to play or pause. It is a bit of bummer that I can't adjust the volume through the ear buds themselves but still pleased with this purchase at this price point since I mainly use this set of earbuds for calls.
customer_reviews.author: dsho

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these (somewhat) on a whim but have been super impressed with them! Great sound quality and noise cancelation. Big plus for me is I'm able to run with them without any issue. They're comfortable and don't hurt my ears, and have a decent battery life. I've only used them for one phone call in the month or so that I've owned them, but person on the other line seemed to be able to hear me just fine. I added a tube of lip balm in the photos as a size reference. *Update: I get five to six hours life after a full charge before they start beeping that the battery is at about 10%.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Loses connection pretty easy
customer_reviews.text: Pros: beautiful/discrete, very comfortable, good isolation/sound quality. THE BIG PROBLEM that ruins everything: the connection between the earbuds and between the earbuds and the device (mobile phone in my case) is very unstable. And it gets worse when you're moving, what renders this almost useless for me, unfortunately. I've returned and bought other model that costed me only US$ 10,00 more, but that has much better connection.
customer_reviews.author: Uilian Souza

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Just got these so review is quite new. Really comfortable in my ears. Great sound for the price. Love the convenient case which charges the earbuds. Well designed. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: BobbiB

customer_reviews.title: These ear buds rock!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with my pair of these, I ordered a pair for my wife! My only complaint would be that I sometimes have trouble getting them to sync to each other so I hear out of both ears. However, 90% of the time I only have 1 in anyway so I can hear anyone that walks up to me to ask a questions, etc. Battery life has been excellent as I have never run out of juice yet since getting them as they charge right back up in the holder in between use. Best ear buds I've ever owned!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Forget Airpods!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best headphones ever. Literally.. this is coming from a 20 year old who listens to a lot of music with bass..YOU ARE NOT WASTING YOUR MONEY I PROMISE. Reminder: you may get confused. When you first get your headphones take them out the case and put it right back in for 10 minutes, the light should be red if its charging. After 10 minutes pick up both headphones and they should both connect!
customer_reviews.author: Myra

customer_reviews.title: Troubleshooting Actually Works!
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with my purchase of these wireless earbuds. However, 5 days after I started using them the right earbuds seemed to stop working. I thought it was something wrong with the charging pins not connecting but that might not have been the issue. I wanted to troubleshoot the issue before I contacted Amazon for a replacement. Luckily there's a troubleshooting guide in the item description that actually worked! I gave this product four stars instead of five since I don't know what actually caused that error and can't predict if this will be an ongoing issue.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Murray

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 17 year old son as replacements for some that he lost. When he first got them he said they sounded good and he had no complaints. After a couple weeks he began to complain about the battery life. It was not until I called him on his cell and he answered using these that I realized what garbage they were. He sounded like he was in a box 10 feet away from his phone, it was horrible.
customer_reviews.author: aric londrie

customer_reviews.title: SO WORTH IT FKSJJKDJS
customer_reviews.text: EDIT: I ACCIDENTALLY PUT THEM THROUGH THE WASHER AND THEY STILL WORK PERFECTLY IM LITERALLY AMAZED. Overall they're great. Sound quality is pretty normal to most wired headphones, they were pretty easy to figure out and connect to a device. The battery life is pretty good I charge them once every two or three days and I use them often. They come with a few different sized earbud things so very comfortable and they don't fall out easy. They don't light up when you touch them to pause a song or video but I don't think they were meant to lol. The charging pod is super small and nice. They're pretty sweet.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Weir

customer_reviews.title: Great sound at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: A good buy and very good sound quality! It was a little confusing to use at first trying to get the synchronized as one, but after a few times and learning its nuances it works great! Great quality at a reasonable price! Handles all types of music from classical to heavy metal, with no loss of quality! I was really pleased either the stereo quality! I had to look behind me once because it felt like the instruments were there! Buy them without fear, overall it is a really great buy! I’ll buy again if I lose them, that’s a promise!!! It rivals higher cost items!
customer_reviews.author: John Aviles

customer_reviews.title: Great sound great fit
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds are amazing for the price. There sound quality exceeded my expectations. They fit great and are low profile. I do wish they were active noise cancellation instead of passive so it could be turned off when needed instead of pulling one out. I'm coming off Samsung's IconX ear buds and I liked the app controls. But these are very promising earbuds
customer_reviews.author: Cyureus

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for the price. Any price.
customer_reviews.text: These sound great no matter the $$. But for 30 bucks they sound as good if not better than anything under $160. Better than Apple (China) earpods for 160. About as good as Samsung true wireless earpods. Samsung prices their products according to quality. Unlike Apple which prices their products according to popularity and FAR from quality. Apple is a brainwashing marketing popularity genius. And the apple zombies let it happen.
customer_reviews.author: Shep

customer_reviews.title: Case is not Charging on 2nd Time-Plastic Was the Culprit
customer_reviews.text: I opened it recently to use, (bought in December 2019) and put them in the case and it charged the first time. Now I am unable to charge. The earbuds just float in the case, no snapping on pins or noise that they are seated to charge. I cannot give more stars unless this works. I have raised my star rating because the charging was not happening due to that plastic on contacts. Once I removed that the buds were charging. I will upgrade to five stars if it performs well in couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: Madhu S. Vashist

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Love!!
customer_reviews.text: I received these earbuds on time and was shocked at first at how small the package was. However, I was pleasantly surprised at the sound quality when listening to music. They connect automatically to your device via bluetooth once you have paired them to each other. You can also use only one if you choose to do so. I have to say that when I am using these in I can ONLY hear the music or whatever I am doing on my device no outside noises. Perfect for online classes and study music.
customer_reviews.author: Online Shopper Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Got these headphones to work out with. Didn't want to spend a ton, and these were some of the cheapest one's I could find, at around $25. It's been about a year and I've had 0 issues with them. The sound quality is great for the price, the battery life is amazing, as I can go about a week or 2 on full charge, with 1-2 hours usage per day. They connect well together and you can use just the left or just the right if you please. They're also IPX5, which is better than some earbuds priced much higher. The best bang for your buck you can get. They also look great and fit compactly in your ear.
customer_reviews.author: Animesh A.

customer_reviews.title: Run!  Far better budget buds on Amazon. These belong in Dollar General
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed in these buds. After reading the reviews you would think they were great, or among the better generics, however Caveat Emptor! The manufacture is dishonest about performance and when I contacted the. They tried to bribe me to give a great review. Never solving the problem. This is my second pair of Haylou and final pair. Sound is below average. Especially, bass and mids. If you love high pitch treble the then these are for you. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: Blev

customer_reviews.title: Do not get these earphones. Tiny sound and left side doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: Very good design. They look very sharp and like a quality product. Thes earphones are a POS. My left side did not work from factory. All bluetooth and all touch activities work but mo sound out of the left side. Did the factory reset many times followed the online videos and nothing. Do not get these earphones. Edit: the new set works left and right. The sound is still not what I expected for the price. There are others better for cheaper. The tipping point is that the earphones cut off intermittently as son as you put your phone in your pocket. Save your money and shop for others.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Tejeda

customer_reviews.title: Innovative ‘touch controls’ on an earbud!
customer_reviews.text: Great earbuds at a great price! Only criticism: functions are toggled by touch controls on the earbud ‘outside’ surface facing away your ear/head, so anytime you touch the bud to adjust it, you’ll inadvertently pause the music, make a call, forward to the next song, etc... not enough a concern to ding a star off the review. Though when these break/get lost I’ll likely look for a pair where controls are a button you press... forward thinking but not quite practical
customer_reviews.author: Lord of Camels 17

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Barely there feel, sound great, stay put.
customer_reviews.text: I am SO pleasantly surprised by these. They sound great and stay put. I almost forget they're in my ears. A little bit of a learning curve for the pairing (to each other, then to the device) but all is well now. I have had some cheapies in the past that lost signal if I went away from my phone at all, but these give me a good 30 feet of freedom in the gym. I also tried them running (after I'd been working out for a while and all sweaty) and they didn't wiggle out like all my pairs before. Life is going to be SO much better! 😃
customer_reviews.author: Dirtbag

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed and will not recommend
customer_reviews.text: These were decent ear buds. However, I’ve changed my mind - it is very difficult to get both sides to pair consistently. I have to always do a hard reset for them to come back to pair together because usually it’s only one side or the other that will pair. Irritating. But now we’re a ix months in and the charging connection has gone bad so that they no longer charge. I could charge if I figured out a way to hold the cord at a very specific angle...but now that doesn’t even work.
customer_reviews.author: an gate

customer_reviews.title: Would 10/10 buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I think these are great. I've always struggled with loud speakers playing across the room and tangled headphones while working out. I tried to make these fall out and they wouldn't. Came charged right out of the box, paired without any problems. The touch options are a bit complicated but easy to get over if you dont mess with them. Lightweight I can wear for hours and not feel them there. They also do a great job of blocking out external noise.
customer_reviews.author: Nope

customer_reviews.title: I can't believe these awesome little things are still kicking.
customer_reviews.text: I have AirPod and Galaxy Buds but they're so expensive that I am simply afraid to lose them. I purchased these as alternatives and since then they've become my daily driver. The sound quality is very good. It's not quite AirPods quality but for such a huge price difference between them these really hold their own. They are so much better than I expected. I like them much better than the Galaxy Buds. Galaxy Buds are not worth the price of admission.
customer_reviews.author: Joel C

customer_reviews.title: Music five stars, phone calls 0 Stars
customer_reviews.text: For this price point, I probably should have given it five stars. I don't want to mislead you and make you think this product is five stars. The sound quality is fantastic but no one can hear me. They say it sounds like I'm in an echo chamber miles away. If I stand still they might be able to hear me over the wind. If you just want these 2 listen to music, I highly recommend them but, for phone calls they are useless for making phone calls.
customer_reviews.author: Sergent31563

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Read all the good reviews and thought wow these must be amazing for the price. Sound quality?? Who knows what the sound quality is. They're waaaayyyyy too quiet. I spent the last 2 hours going through settings on my phone, updating my phone and everything. It's not the phone it's these. Or at least so far it seems that way so far. Will play around for a tad longer then sending these back. Here's to a few wasted hours of my life on garbage. Should have learned from buying Chinese junk
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible battery life
customer_reviews.text: The product was small and ok for the price the battery life though wasn't what it said it would be the first try it lasted 2 hrs then just started lasting 1 or half an hour i would charge it for acouple hrs and same thing the things that sucks is that it says 100% but then 1 minute later or seconda later will go say 70% terrible battery life but then again they were cheap so theres that anyway if you buy good luck with that.
customer_reviews.author: sandy cheeks

customer_reviews.title: Great...especially for the price.
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I bought them because I can only have 1 earbud in at a time at work and I was tired of one side of my wired BT headphones dangling awkwardly. The price was right and I wasn't expecting much. They work great, the sound is good, and the battery seems to last a long time. The case is the best part. It is compact with a magnetic lid so it won't randomly just pop open in my purse and it serves as a charger when I'm not using them.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Small but mighty.
customer_reviews.text: These were easy to connect to my phone, and have a great sound. I like that you can listen to just one or both earbuds at the same time. They are so small that they really can't be detected at work which is good. Only con would be they are so small and compact that I would love some kind of carrying case sack or maybe a necklace chain for them? They are very easy to lose. I don't know I just know it would be nice perk. Overall, great earbuds for the price. No need to waste money on the expensive ones! These are really good!
customer_reviews.author: MzLopez4Real

customer_reviews.title: Light weight earpods with best value for money
customer_reviews.text: These earpods are light, readily paired with my cell phones once I take them out from the charging case. I tested with few of my favorite songs and the overall sound was best for the price. On a single go, I listened to music for one and half hour still the battery was 100%. There was no disturbance in sound when I leave my cell phone on other room and roam around with the earpods. A place for improvement is the micro usb charging which could have been better with usb type c. All in all its a good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Atit Parajuli

customer_reviews.title: I like everything about them except that they don't work consistently well
customer_reviews.text: I would love these were it not for the reality that if i listen to them, there is virtually no chance within a few minutes, they 2on't skip from ear to ear, sometimes only working out of the right ear, sometimes the left. At least 95% of the time they are fine, meaning both are delivering sound. But to be clear, i dont mean that 95 percent of the time I use them i don't have a problem. I mean almost 100 percent of the time I use them i have the problem, where by 95% of the session is ok, but 5 % of the session it skips between ears.
customer_reviews.author: gary55305

customer_reviews.title: Heard bass details I haven't heard before
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I'm surprised. Bass is real. Not body thumping, but it's a small driver headphone. You want thumping, sit in your Civic and crank up your subwoofers. With this earplugs, I heard exquisite detail of Michael Anthony's bass lines on Women And Children First. While working out. Never realized how talented he is. Maybe I need to check out his other stuff. Pretty cheap. Touch controls seem strange. Can't seem to turn it off, but they go off when put back in the charging box.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kellner

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable, great music sound
customer_reviews.text: Great quality earbuds! The sound is impressive for music, videos, etc... The call quality is good, noise cancelling is okay, 4 stars. I would say a solid 5 stars for everything else. The case is super compact compared to other earbuds. They charge quickly and stay charged for a long time. The most comfortable earbuds I have tried. Most start to feel heavy, but I forget I am wearing these. I would highly suggest buying these for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Rheanna Walker Cleland

customer_reviews.title: Two pair failed within days of receiving them.
customer_reviews.text: They worked right out of the package and paired easily. The problem is that the charging port, charging case or earbuds themselves failed to charge. I’m left with useless earbuds. I returned the first pair for an exchange, but missed the second return window. Money lost and lesson learned. Return as soon as you see the problem and don’t wait to “try and see” if you can get them to work. New items shouldn’t require any special “fixing” to use them or make them operational. With the easy returns now through UPS and Kohl’s, you (I) should have no reason to take advantage of Amazon’s liberal return policy.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Swiers

customer_reviews.title: Won't charge..
customer_reviews.text: Won't charge. I received the ear buds fully charged. Excellent sound quality, fit is great. After using for about 3 or 4 hours, they shut off and registered fully drained on my phone. I replaced them in their charger. Checked on them 3 hrs later. No charge. I plugged in the charger. Red light went for about 4 mins & shut off. I unplugged the charger. Left the ear buds in overnight(10 hrs). Still dead.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Couture

customer_reviews.title: Charging issue solved
customer_reviews.text: If your earbuds won't charge, REMOVE THE PLASTIC STICKERS over the earbuds' charging contacts. They're nearly invisible, just scrape them away with your fingernail. I like these better than expected. Surprisingly good bass. Great customer support as well.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun R

customer_reviews.title: Incredible sound and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are forking fantastic! I used them to watch Into the Spiderverse on my Google Pixel 3a last night and I was blown away. The bass in these things is incredible. There was zero lag between the video and audio through the headphones. This is my first pair of wireless headphones and I can't believe I waited so long to get some. I use one earbud at work so I can hear around me, and it sounds great. The pairing is practically instant when you pull one or both earbuds from the case. For $20 these things are incredible value.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality but Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound quality, but only got to 6hr playtime max. Case is very convenient, I love that they stop charging themselves automatically, and they're very comfortable in the ear. HOWEVER after about 6 months of semi-regular use they stopped pairing to each other properly - I can get them to both turn on, but only the left one will pair to a device. I tried factory resetting multiple times, nothing worked. Can't get in contact with the seller and I can't find the additional warranty I also purchased. Also total pricing BS - on black friday these were marketed as normally being $42 and they dropped to $22 for the sale, and now they're just $22 all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING BRAND!!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. I see some people complain but to be honest they fit great as I have small ears and they fit perfect. I don't have to worry about them falling out. Also, the bass is great. If it's not deep enough, you can always download a bass booster for your phone. I enjoy the touch feature on the earphones. But sensitive. Was easy pairing to my Galaxy S10. I had no issues. Just took them out case and turned on and it automatically connected. I don't understand the issues people are having. Would recommend a hundred times over. For the price and quality, I made an excellent choice, I LOVE MY EARPHONES!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sonja

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable and extremely light weight. Once I put them in my ears, I don't notice them. For the price, the sound quality was good. They're not high end headphones by any means, but they sound much better than most earbuds I've tried. They paired with my phone easily and I've had no connectivity issues. The touch controls take some getting used to, and I wish they were more sensitive. Many times my taps wouldn't register. Overall, I think these are a good pair of headphones
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Steward

customer_reviews.title: Incredible value for the price
customer_reviews.text: You can keep your silly-looking AirPods. These fit perfectly in my ear, connect quickly to the default phone/tablet easily and sound great. And the case can fit comfortably in your pocket. The only issue I had was occasionally tapping them off accidentally and thinking I lost connection. But I've learned how to scratch my ear or wipe off my sweat now, so I don't do it anymore. I haven't really evaluated the noise-canceling or pushed the battery life yet, but I'm betting they'll be damned good.
customer_reviews.author: JunkCult

customer_reviews.title: Really nice product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my mom and she loves the touch feature on it. Just a tap with her finger she can pause or play. She really enjoyed how small the whole thing is and doesn’t take much room in her bag. Really good battery life and really nice that it has a magnetic lid!
customer_reviews.author: Misty Flota

customer_reviews.title: Works well and looks nice
customer_reviews.text: The earbuds work really well. Sound quality is good for the price, and I loooove the matte finish and the oval shape, which makes the earbuds look really high quality. They fit my ears perfectly and I never have to worry about them falling out. It does take a little longer for the right one to connect to the charging case than the left one, but it still charges once connected so that's not a big problem. Overall it's an amazing product and I'd recommend it to anyone looking for a pair of affordable earbuds!
customer_reviews.author: Queena Chang

customer_reviews.title: Average product.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is ok and decent but not that loud. Doesn't really cancel loud noises but still works decent. The battery life is average. It gets about 3 hours of continuous play with a full charge. The main thing I don't lime is, it does not connect automatically when I take them out of the charging case. They do cut on but I have to keep pairing them or shut off the Bluetooth sensors and re activate it to connect. * I have a Note 9*.. But its a decent product.
customer_reviews.author: Jaded Truth

customer_reviews.title: Get them now before price goes up!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! After charging for less than 10 minutes I can listen ti books on tape or music for 8 hours with 1 bud - If I use them separately I have twice that amount. They are comfortable also. I have a lot of trouble with earbuds due to part that goes in the ear. I was leary, but the price couldnt be beat! Love them so much I got another set! One for on the go, one for at home. Best purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kim L. Medina

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I got these because I wanted wireless earbuds and there was no way I was going to spend 130 on Samsung buds . These were more comfortable than the Samsung buds anyway. Surprisingly good for the price, case is a bit cheap but for the price you can't complain. Sound quality is good. I had some trouble figuring out the connection thing first but I got help from the Amazon assistance people and got it right away turns out that for both to sound at the same time the left ear bud has to connect to the right first. Then the right connects to the phone . At least that's how it worked for me
customer_reviews.author: Pau

customer_reviews.title: Will end up buying second pair
customer_reviews.text: I qm actualy pretty impressed. These paired easily with my phone and stayed put when i put them in my ears with out hurting them. The sound quality was more then acceptable for quality. I like the fact they are small enough to fit into my coat pocket ot purse. I am guessing my boyfriend will probably claim on of them this summer for his rides if my kids dont snake them first. Lol. I found them worth the money and the gamble to try them paid off .
customer_reviews.author: tara

customer_reviews.title: Left earbud disconnected and will not connect again!!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this product a few weeks ago and wanted to wait on the review until we test it properly. At first it worked like a charm but later the left earbud disconnected and will not connect again. I searched the web on similar problems and correction so I tried with another phone but the same happened and that lead me to believe it is in the hardware. If the seller does not contact me to replace it I will be returning for sure. I hope others are not running into the same issue
customer_reviews.author: M. Salem

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these!!!! They are really good. Because they cancel the noise I just get zeroed in on my work out. And they stay in well. Especially when I go mountain bike riding. The only thing that is a bit annoying is how sensitive the touch is. I have to be careful when putting it in my ear or when taking it off because I’ll turn them off and a slight touch will turn them on again. That’s the only thing that I would have a complain about. Other than that they work amazing! Better than my Beats and that’s saying something!
customer_reviews.author: ethel royal

customer_reviews.title: Was initially good, but isn't functional anymore
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was really good in the beginning, I really enjoyed the sound quality and the way they look. But since I've had them I've had problems with them disconnecting from my phone or not being able to sync correctly. Recently I tried charging them in the case and it didn't work (for one of the buds) I was looking at it more close and I realized that the metal part that touches the prongs in the case was worn down. Why this is I have no clue, I go this in December and have only had it for four months before it broke.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley S.

customer_reviews.title: They work "great" and sound "good"
customer_reviews.text: These were bought as a prize for our family Christmas party. Our teenage grand daughter won them and says they work great and sound good. Great and good are better than "okay" which is what would normally come from a teen. They were inexpensive which was also good because kids tend to lose things so I'd rather these get lost than high dollar buds. Based on the teens review I guess you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: LGC

customer_reviews.title: Good for music, no good for talking
customer_reviews.text: Fit and finish is excellent feel very well made with quality, the size is very small, the operation of connecting is good, music sound quality is excellent, but it has a background his noise, phone calls sound quality, no background noise cancellation, and the voice sounds far and low in volume, so it works great if you are in an quiet office environment, but if you work outside or noisy warehouse, these are useless.
customer_reviews.author: Lokitoz

customer_reviews.title: Not recommending this product...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: design, weight, size of case Cons: sound quality, battery life, mic Fairly inexpensive. Sleek profile. You will forget that you are wearing earbuds. But... Only holds 3 to 4 hours of charge. Mediocre battery on the case. No LED lights indicating power on the case. Audio issues during phone calls. I returned mine and ordered a different brand (soundpeats) instead.
customer_reviews.author: Ver Santzskie

customer_reviews.title: Works for the price, worth it
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I've been skeptical about wireless earbuds since I've seen airpods, but these are really nice. My fiance tried them out first, she originally wanted them. She did say they didnt pair right and it was irritating so she got a pair of beats wireless instead and gave these to me. Which is fine, and I like them. So far they have paired easily for me. The battery isnt too bad either. I would reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Emmsterdamm

customer_reviews.title: Buy elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: earbuds lose connection to phone rather easily. Have to be placed in your ear just right. Wouldn’t recommend paying this much for them. Plus, the touch pause/play doesn’t work like it claims. Now 3/5 stars These wireless earbuds are great, and exactly what I wanted. I wanted something indiscreet, while being comfortable with good sound. These have great noise cancellation, and the sound is awesome. Highly recommend, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Daniella Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: I’m realizing it’s hard to find a high quality pair of earbuds. My biggest problem with these earbuds is that they disconnect sometimes after a few hours of use. Usually they reconnect without issue. However, there have been a few times where only one earbud will connect to my phone at a time and I have to reset them. It’s really annoying. Check the product description to see how to reset them because it took me a few tries.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, still not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Second update...a couple days after my last review they will no longer pair to each other...have done the reset about a dozen times...wont work, junk! Changing back to one star.Finally got them to pair to each other...so raised my rating from 1 star to 3...had a hard time setting them up, their "touch panels " dont respond to my fingers very well...would rather they just had a button Cannot get buds to link to each other...only one works at a time...definitely disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: I'm never taking these off
customer_reviews.text: Lol I'm a mom and sometimes I just need peace and quiet 😂 I'm legit never taking these off. Noise cancellation is pretty good. I can still hear my crotch goblin crying over not letting her touch the stove, but not loud enough I lose my mind. Music plays great & clear + no cord so your little demon baby can't pull them out of your ear and rip out your ear canal 🤣 but yeah I'm in love PS I love my baby to dead but I'm sure parents reading this review know the mood im in today & understand 🤣🤣🤣🤣
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: These are great! Make sure you remove protective plastic covers!
customer_reviews.text: These worked great out of the box, but then went dead. I tried charging them but they would only get about a minute charge even though I would leave them charging overnight. I was pretty upset. I was getting ready to return them when I read some comments that said there is a tiny protective sticker on the charging port of each earbud. Sure enough, there it was. I removed them and they work like a charm now. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Everitt

customer_reviews.title: Solid value!  Nice little ear buds.
customer_reviews.text: Solid earbuds for the money! I found these earbuds to be comfortable with great sound quality. I like the charging/pocket case. I wish the LED indicator light was easier to see on the top or front of the case but that’s being pretty nit-picky. After charging them up they worked perfectly out of the box pairing to my iPhone X without any issues. All in all these a very solid wireless earbuds. I was compensated for this review with a free set of these earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Gaust

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculous
customer_reviews.text: I don’t understand how people like these. I run and HIIT and they regularly get loose and fall out of my ears. I tried changing the ear size but no better. Then when I push them back in before they fall or after they fell, the music stops because you touched them. It’s ridiculous. Plus, good luck remembering the 10 different taps to start/stop/skip, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Mountaingen

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely trash.
customer_reviews.text: Came in yesterday, charged it and tried it out. The left ear sounds like a static tv. The right ear sounded decent. After an hour, i had a low battery alert. I put it in the case and noticed it was not charging. Put the case back on the charger and it also was not charging. Changed different cables, and it still wont charge. Junk. Now i have to waste my time returning this crap.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mom Of 2

customer_reviews.title: Pretty light and love the sound quality
customer_reviews.text: So I have been using this for couple of days and this is what I think about it. First I must say it is pretty light, and the sound quality is pretty awesome. And being light helps it to stick to your ear and not fall easily. Only the thing is it doesn’t feel premium when you wear it but looks good. Last for 2 days on medium use. For the price it’s not bad definitely.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Kwan

customer_reviews.title: Best quality Bluetooth earbuds I've used.
customer_reviews.text: I love these earbuds, the battery easily lasts 4 hours without going dead. I lost them for 2 weeks while moving only find out my wife had washed them in a pair of pants I was wearing. I picked them up and tested them out. Still charged still sounding amazing. Post washing AND drying. Would buy again. Amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I now own four sets of wireless earbuds. Because of their light weight and small tips, they are by far the most comfortable that I own. The Tranya T2 is an excellent choice with excellent range but its smallest tip is too big for my ears. In contrast, the medium tip for Haylou GT1 fits perfectly. The case is similar to the Tranya, but is smaller, lighter and the magnetic lid makes the case for secure. Excellent value here.
customer_reviews.author: William R. Creech

customer_reviews.title: Good sound. Some physical limitations.
customer_reviews.text: Not used to the buttonless operation, but I’ll get the hang of it. I have arthritis and have problem opening the case-too smooth to grip Hard to get buds out of case. Had to give up during the night and put aside. This problem would not exist on nimble fingers. A nimble fingered person would love these buds. Probably not many older folk use earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: B. Jones

customer_reviews.title: no battery indicator, but great sound & comfort
customer_reviews.text: Favorite feature is that I can pair them separately to my iPhone for mono listening. Sound quality is great for phone conversations as well. Light weight, comfortable. One downfall about them is the lack of indicator lights letting you know the battery available. With no way to tell, I'll be listening and it suddenly die. Luckily for me, I exclusively listen using 1 at a time, so I just exchange for the other while it charges.
customer_reviews.author: Stephaniek219

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my husband and he likes them
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my husband and he hasn't complained about them yet so I know they are great. My husband can ignore me all day and not hear my complaining so I highly suggest buying them if you have a nagging wife like myself.
customer_reviews.author: Deva Marcy

customer_reviews.title: Better than Redmi Airdots / Great Introduction to True Wireless
customer_reviews.text: Having just gotten a pair of Xiaomi Redmi Airdots before these and being disappointed with the poor to average sound quality and lack of functions I figured I’d get these and compare. The Haylou GT1 totally outshine the Redmi Airdots in every way. The sound quality is great, the touch functionality works well, and the range and battery life are good. These will be my daily drivers for a while and are definitely worth getting if you’re looking for your first pair of True Wireless Earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Nixon

customer_reviews.title: These are good earbuds
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds I bought for my wife. She loves them for listening to podcasts and YouTube while she works around the house. I have asked her if she would buy them again and she said "yes." Asking what she likes about them she said the small size and the ease of use. The battery seems to last a long time. The price is very economical. For the price these are worth it.
customer_reviews.author: LovinLife

customer_reviews.title: Happy with them for the price :)
customer_reviews.text: My bf has had them for over a month now and they're holding up great on his workdays, where they're exposed to long hours of high temperatures and sweat. They're easy to connect and I like the design, he's had no trouble keeping them paired to his phone, audio on phone calls was clear, all in all worth the money! I'll update my review if they fail within six months, otherwise I'll be buying another set
customer_reviews.author: Music T

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, mike not usable for calls or games
customer_reviews.text: The sound is good. They're good at cancelling noise. The battery life is pretty good. You can use them one at a time or both together which is cool. They have a mike so you could, in theory, use it for phone calls or gaming but it's so muffled and muted that no one can understand you. If that's an important feature for you pick something else.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Touch control is annoying
customer_reviews.text: My ears have a weird shape so I can't comment on how well they stay in. As a result I have to constantly readjust all headphones. Every time I touch them to readjust the touch setting plays/pauses. This is pretty annoying. Another thing I disliked is the autoplay feature. As soon as they connect they will start playing whatever they can. I only had them a few days and got something else because of the touch feature. I need a button to press.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

product_meta.title: True Wireless Earbuds,Haylou GT1 Bluetooth 5.0 Sports HD Stereo Touch Control Ear Buds with IPX5 Waterproof/Fast Connection/Mini Case(Only 30g)/Total 12H Playtime (Black) (Black)
feature_bullets: 9 New Updates: Bluetooth 5.0, superior sound quality, total 12 hours play time, 4g ultra-lightweight, zero pressure multi-function touch Control, DSP noise-canceling technology, voice assistant, IPX5(Professional Laboratory Certification), magnetic lid.

Superior Music Quality: A better wireless experience starts with what you hear.7.2mm dynamic driver has been embedded in this small earbud. Coupled with Advanced Audio Coding(AAC) and high-polymer diaphragm, GT1 delivers punchy bass and soft, clear mid-highs. and the Hifi stereo sound can offer face-to-face calling experience！

Wireless Freedom Meets BT 5.0: Powered by global professional Realtek chipset and next-generation BT 5.0 technology, our wireless earbuds own stable connect and easier operation. Quick pairing out of the box. And just put them back into the charging case, it will charging. These are our GT1 engineered to deliver a better wireless experience.

Smaller but More Powerful: Slip them in your pocket and go!This charging box even smaller than a lipstick or a lighter! And other than that GT1 deliver 4 hours of listening time and 3.5 hours of talk time on a single charge. The mini charging box is able to provide earbuds with an extra 8 hours of battery life.

Easy control with taps and hold: Feel enough of the physical button in earbuds？A high-precision touch sensor in both the earbuds allows you to effortlessly and comfortable using multiple functions without reaching for your phone.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars8,219 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
